meta.identifier: In the Belly of the Beast

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the end of any Movement phase in which one or more units disembarks from a Hellforged Mastadon, roll a D6. On the roll of a 1, one model from a disembarking unit, chosen by the controlling player, is slain. The number of models removed due to the effects of this rule are counted as slain models for the Mastadon's Machina Malefica ability at the end of the turn.

profiles.name: In the Belly of the Beast
